extracted_rules.rule_name: Minimum and Maximum Lot Sizes for New Lots

Qualifiers.scope: Creation of new lots under the subdivision ordinance.
Qualifiers.applicability: Applies to five R-1 zone districts: R-1, R-1(7000), R-1(8000), R-1(10000), R-1(20000).
exclusions: Does not apply to existing lots, only new lots created via subdivision.

Conditions.description: A new lot must satisfy all of the following dimensional requirements.

Exceptions.description: The maximum lot size may be exceeded under the following conditions.

cases.condition: Removal of underlying lot lines to eliminate non-conformities AND results in no net loss of housing.
An adjacent substandard lot (width < 25') is combined with another lot AND results in no net loss of housing.
The resultant number of lots increases or stays the same AND results in no net loss of housing.

Relationships.hierarchical: This rule is a primary regulation under the 'subdivision ordinance'.
Relationships.logical_dependencies: Defines the standard lot sizes which are the basis for identifying 'substandard lots' in rule P08-S2-R1.

Qualifiers.scope: Defines the criteria for a lot to be considered 'substandard'.
Qualifiers.applicability: Applies to existing lots within the five R-1 zone districts.

Constants.name: area_thresholds_by_zone_and_type
Constants.description: Area is less than or equal to 83% of the minimum lot size for the zone.

Conditions.description: A lot is defined as substandard if it meets the dimensional criteria AND the area criteria.

sub_clauses.value: threshold based on zone.district and lot.type

Relationships.logical_dependencies: This definition is a prerequisite for applying the special regulations in rule P08-S3-R1. The area thresholds are derived from the minimum lot sizes in rule P08-S1-R1.

Qualifiers.scope: Specifies alternative development regulations that override standard rules for height, yards, and garage location.
Qualifiers.applicability: Applies only to lots that meet the definition of 'substandard' per rule P08-S2-R1.

Constants.name: standard_garage_location_comparison
Constants.value: 75' back from the front lot line

Conditions.description: If a lot is substandard, the following specific regulations apply, some with additional conditions.

then.set_value: in the rear half of the lot

Relationships.logical_dependencies: This entire rule is conditional upon a lot meeting the criteria defined in rule P08-S2-R1.

Ambiguous_Language.term: in the rear half of the lot
Ambiguous_Language.reason: Lacks a precise mathematical definition for automated validation. It could mean the rear 50% of the lot's depth, or the area behind the midpoint of the main building. Requires clarification.
